patient_info: Uterine leiomyoma,Syncope,Muscle weakness,Cardiomegaly,Dilated cardiomyopathy,Abnormal tricuspid valve morphology,Right ventricular failure,Weight loss,Palpitations,Nausea,Exertional dyspnea,Hyperlipidemia,Poor appetite,Paroxysmal ventricular tachycardia,Elevated pulmonary artery pressure,Right ventricular dilatation,Abnormal left ventricular function,Paroxysmal atrial tachycardia,Reduced systolic function,Premature ventricular contraction,Loss of consciousness,Pedal edema,Decreased urine output,Right atrial enlargement,Increased circulating NT-proBNP concentration,Nonproductive cough

predict_diagnosis:
1. Hereditary angioedema (HAE)
2. Familial hypercholesterolemia (FH)
3. Long QT syndrome (LQTS)
4. Brugada syndrome (BS)
5. Catecholaminergic polymorphic ventricular tachycardia (CPVT)
6. Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM)
7. Arrhythmogenic right ventricular cardiomyopathy (ARVC)
8. Mediastinal masses (e.g., thymoma, lymphoma)
9. Pulmonary embolism (PE)
10. Autoimmune hemolytic anemia (AIHA)
